ppe_requirements.respiratory: MANDATORY: Full-face pressure-demand SCBA or positive-pressure supplied-air respirator. No air-purifying respirators approved - extremely toxic.
ppe_requirements.skin: Butyl rubber or neoprene gloves, fully-encapsulating chemical protective suit for gas contact.
ppe_requirements.eye: Chemical safety goggles and full face shield
ppe_requirements.minimum_level: Level A for unknown concentrations or >0.1 ppm, Level B minimum for known concentrations <0.1 ppm
ppe_requirements.special_notes: ONE OF THE MOST TOXIC INDUSTRIAL CHEMICALS. Chemical warfare agent. Delayed pulmonary edema 2-48 hours post-exposure. SELF-RESCUE RESPIRATORS INADEQUATE - immediate SCBA required.

physical_properties.odor: Musty hay or freshly cut grass odor @ 0.4-1.5 ppm - WARNING: Odor threshold ABOVE safe levels

emergency_response.fire_hazard: Non-flammable. Cylinders may explode when heated. Decomposes in heat producing deadly gases.
emergency_response.fire_suppression: EVACUATE IMMEDIATELY. Extremely deadly decomposition products. Use unmanned equipment only. Water spray from maximum distance to cool cylinders.
emergency_response.spill_procedures: EVACUATE LARGE AREA IMMEDIATELY. Call HAZMAT. SCBA MANDATORY. Extremely lethal at ppm levels. Neutralize with ammonia or caustic soda solution. Specialized cleanup required.
emergency_response.exposure_immediate_actions: MEDICAL EMERGENCY. Remove to fresh air immediately. Administer 100% oxygen. NO artificial respiration if breathing. Monitor for 48 hours - DELAYED PULMONARY EDEMA likely. Hospitalize immediately even if asymptomatic. Inform medical staff: phosgene exposure.
emergency_response.environmental_hazards: Toxic to all life. Hydrolyzes to HCl and CO2 in water. Report ANY release immediately.
emergency_response.special_hazards: CHEMICAL WARFARE AGENT (WWI). EXTREMELY TOXIC. Delayed pulmonary edema 2-48 hours after asymptomatic period - sudden death possible. Odor warning INADEQUATE (threshold above safe levels). Hydrolyzes to hydrochloric acid in lungs. Death can occur hours after "feeling fine".

storage_requirements.temperature_range: Store cylinders <52°C. Keep cool - above 8°C gas becomes liquid.
storage_requirements.ventilation: Outdoor storage STRONGLY PREFERRED. Indoor only with continuous mechanical ventilation, emergency backup, phosgene detection with REMOTE alarms.
storage_requirements.container_material: Steel cylinders only. Glass for laboratory quantities.
storage_requirements.segregation: ISOLATED storage. Separate from ALL other chemicals. Restricted area with multiple barriers.
storage_requirements.quantity_limits: MINIMIZE. Many jurisdictions prohibit or strictly limit quantities.
storage_requirements.special_requirements: CRITICAL: Phosgene detection system with remote monitoring and alarms MANDATORY. Post "CHEMICAL WARFARE AGENT - EXTREME DANGER" signs. Restricted access - authorized trained personnel only with buddy system. Emergency procedures and antidote protocol posted. Medical surveillance required. Notification to local emergency services REQUIRED.

reactivity.stability: Stable when dry. Hydrolyzes slowly in moist air. Rapidly in water.
reactivity.reactivity_hazard: Hydrolyzes with water forming hydrochloric acid (corrosive). Reacts violently with active metals. May explode on contact with aluminum powder.

environmental_impact.aquatic_toxicity: Extremely toxic but rapidly hydrolyzes to HCl and CO2 in water. Environmental impact primarily from hydrolysis products.
environmental_impact.biodegradability: Not biodegradable. Hydrolyzes rapidly to CO2 and HCl.
environmental_impact.soil_mobility: High mobility as gas. Hydrolyzes on contact with soil moisture.
environmental_impact.atmospheric_fate: Photolyzes and hydrolyzes. Atmospheric half-life: hours. Forms HCl with water vapor.

reportable_releases.air: 10 lbs/day - IMMEDIATELY reportable due to extreme toxicity

detection_monitoring.odor_threshold: 0.4-1.5 ppm - UNRELIABLE. Odor threshold ABOVE safe exposure limits. NEVER rely on odor. MANDATORY continuous monitoring.
